description:
Fix a bug where if we converted a std::string into a WebCore::String,
the encoding will be incorrect. We assume std::string is UTF-8, but
WebCore assume it's Latin-1 when you use the 8-bit constructor.


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=3375
